dt: {bc}to cause to fall like or as snow
{bc}to cover, shut in, or imprison with or as if with snow

shortdef: to fall in or as snow
to cause to fall like or as snow
to cover, shut in, or imprison with or as if with snow

dt: {bc}precipitation in the form of small white ice crystals formed directly from the water vapor of the air at a temperature of less than 32°F (0°C)
{bc}a descent or shower of snow crystals
{bc}a dessert made of stiffly beaten whites of eggs, sugar, and fruit pulp
{bc}a usually white crystalline substance that condenses from a fluid phase as snow does
{bc}small transient light or dark spots on a television screen

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}snāw{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}snēo{/it} snow, Latin {it}niv-, nix{/it}, Greek {it}nipha{/it} (accusative)
shortdef: precipitation in the form of small white ice crystals formed directly from the water vapor of the air at a temperature of less than 32°F (0°C)
a descent or shower of snow crystals
a mass of fallen snow crystals

dt: {bc}snow that has increased acidity caused by environmental factors (such as atmospheric pollutants)

shortdef: snow that has increased acidity caused by environmental factors (such as atmospheric pollutants)

dt: {bc}granular snow formed by alternate thawing and freezing

shortdef: granular snow formed by alternate thawing and freezing

dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Chionodoxa{/it}) of hardy spring-flowering chiefly Mediterranean bulbous herbs of the lily family with basal leaves and racemes of blue, white, or pink flowers

shortdef: any of a genus (Chionodoxa) of hardy spring-flowering chiefly Mediterranean bulbous herbs of the lily family with basal leaves and racemes of blue, white, or pink flowers

dt: {bc}snow colored by various airborne dusts or by a growth of algae (as of the genus {it}Chlamydomonas{/it}) that contain red pigment and live in the upper layer of snow

shortdef: snow colored by various airborne dusts or by a growth of algae (as of the genus Chlamydomonas) that contain red pigment and live in the upper layer of snow; also : an alga causing red snow

dt: {bc}to overwhelm especially in excess of capacity to absorb or deal with something

shortdef: to overwhelm especially in excess of capacity to absorb or deal with something
to defeat by a large margin
